      • Animator

        public Animator(java.awt.image.BufferedImage[] animation,
                double time,
                boolean generateFlipped)
        Constructor that initializes all needed attributes. Generates flipped animation if generateFlipped parameter is true.
        Parameters:
        animation - frames of the animation
        time - Time it takes to switch between images(seconds)
        generateFlipped - true = generate flipped animation
